chapter.text: 95|4|abasya'i amara srsti karechi manusake sundaratama gathane [1]
95|5|tarapara amara take hinatagrastadera hinatame parinata kari – [1]
95|6|kintu taderake naya yara imana eneche ebam satkarma kareche; edera jan'ya to ache nirabacchinna puraskara [1].
95|7|Kaje'i (he manusa!) Erapara kise tomake karmaphala dina samparke abisbasi kare [1]
95|8|allah ki bicarakadera madhye sarbasrestha bicaraka nana [1]
